attributes.name: onTap
attributes.description: The function to call when the button is tapped (mobile) or pressed (desktop).

attributes.name: textColor
attributes.description: The color of the text inside the button.

attributes.name: flush
attributes.description: Makes the button flish with the elements around it (removes the margin).

attributes.name: block
attributes.description: Makes the button display as a block element.

attributes.name: fill
attributes.description: Makes the button take the width and height of its container. Overwrites `width` and `height`.

attributes.name: raised
attributes.description: Changes the button style to a "raised" style. Changes color to `Theme.button.color` and textColor to `Theme.button.textColor` and adds a box-shadow.

attributes.name: padding
attributes.description: Adjusts the padding around the button text.

attributes.name: cornerRadius
attributes.description: Adjust the rounding of the button's corners.

attributes.name: animation
attributes.description: Sets the css class to control property animations on the button.
